europeana:record.dc:title: Redescription of Phaenocarpa Seitneri Fahringer and notes on its Biology (Hymenoptera: Braconidae: Alysiinae)
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Achterberg, van C.
Roques A.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Insecta
Braconidae; Alysiinae; Alysiini; Phaenocarpa seitneri; redescription; biology; hosts; Lasiomma; Anthomyiidae; biogeography
europeana:record.dc:description: Phaenocarpa seitneri Fahringer, 1929 (Braconidae: Alysiina: Alysiini) is redescribed, a lectotype is designated and figured, and notes on its biology are given. In the French Alps P. seitneri frequently is a parasite of Lasiomma melania Ackland, L. infrequens Ackland and L. laricicola Karl on European Larch.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Redescription of Phaenocarpa Seitneri Fahringer and notes on its Biology (Hymenoptera: Braconidae: Alysiinae) (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 61) (Issue 4)
